ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games

9 using System;
10 using System.Collections;
11 using System.Collections.Generic;
12 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
13 
14 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session
15 {
20  public class Session : IEnumerable<Match>
21  {
22  // Internal auxiliary class used for match making
23  private class DummyThinkerPrototype : IThinkerPrototype
24  {
25  public string ThinkerName => "Dummy";
26  public IThinker Create() => null;
27  }
28 
29  // List of matches
30  private IList<Match> matches;
31 
32  // Table of results
33  private IDictionary<Match, Winner> results;
34 
35  // Current points for each thinker
36  private IDictionary<string, int> thinkerPoints;
37 
38  // Points per win, loss and draw
39  private int pointsPerWin, pointsPerLoss, pointsPerDraw;
40 
41  // Match enumerator
42  private IEnumerator<Match> matchEnumerator;
43 
55  public Session(IEnumerable<IThinkerPrototype> thinkerPrototypes,
56  ISessionConfig sessionConfig, bool complete = false)
57  {
58  // Create a list of thinkers from the given enumerable
59  IList<IThinkerPrototype> thinkerProtList =
60  new List<IThinkerPrototype>(thinkerPrototypes);
61 
62  // Number of thinkers
63  int numThinkers = thinkerProtList?.Count ?? 0;
64 
65  // Check if there are enough thinkers
66  if (numThinkers < 2)
67  throw new InvalidOperationException(
68  "A tournament must have at least two thinkers, "
69  + $"but only {numThinkers} where specified");
70 
71  // Keep note of points per win, draw and loss
72  this.pointsPerWin = sessionConfig.PointsPerWin;
73  this.pointsPerLoss = sessionConfig.PointsPerLoss;
74  this.pointsPerDraw = sessionConfig.PointsPerDraw;
75 
76  // Initialize the table of thinker points
77  thinkerPoints = new Dictionary<string, int>(numThinkers);
78 
79  // Initialize the list of matches
80  matches = new List<Match>();
81 
82  // Initialize the list of results
83  results = new Dictionary<Match, Winner>();
84 
85  // We need an even number of players to set up the
86  // matches, so add a fake one if necessary
87  if (thinkerProtList.Count % 2 != 0)
88  thinkerProtList.Add(new DummyThinkerPrototype());
89 
90  // Setup matches using the round-robin method
91  // https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Round-robin_tournament
92  for (int i = 1; i < thinkerProtList.Count; i++)
93  {
94  // This will be the thinker to swap position after each round
95  IThinkerPrototype thinkerToSwapPosition;
96 
97  // Set up matches for current round i
98  for (int j = 0; j < thinkerProtList.Count / 2; j++)
99  {
100  // This is match j for current round i
101  Match match = new Match(
102  thinkerProtList[j],
103  thinkerProtList[thinkerProtList.Count - 1 - j]);
104  // Only add match to match list if it's not a dummy
105  // match
106  if (!(match.thinkerWhite is DummyThinkerPrototype
107  || match.thinkerRed is DummyThinkerPrototype))
108  {
109  // Add match to match list
110  matches.Add(match);
111 
112  // If the tournament is complete, also add a match with
113  // the same thinkers but with reversed roles
114  if (complete)
115  {
116  matches.Add(match.Swapped);
117  }
118  }
119  }
120  // Swap AI positions for next round
121  thinkerToSwapPosition =
122  thinkerProtList[thinkerProtList.Count - 1];
123  thinkerProtList.RemoveAt(thinkerProtList.Count - 1);
124  thinkerProtList.Insert(1, thinkerToSwapPosition);
125  }
126 
127  // Initialize the match enumerator
128  matchEnumerator = GetEnumerator();
129  }
130 
135  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<Match, Winner>> GetResults()
136  {
137  // Loop through all matches
138  foreach (Match m in matches)
139  {
140  // If there is a result for the current match...
141  if (results.ContainsKey(m))
142  // ...return it
143  yield return new KeyValuePair<Match, Winner>(m, results[m]);
144  }
145  }
146 
151  public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> GetStandings()
152  {
153  // Create an array to place thinkers and their points
154  KeyValuePair<string, int>[] standings =
155  new KeyValuePair<string, int>[thinkerPoints.Count];
156 
157  // Populate the array with thinkers and their points
158  thinkerPoints.CopyTo(standings, 0);
159 
160  // Sort the array in descending order according to thinker points
161  Array.Sort(standings, (a, b) => b.Value - a.Value);
162 
163  // Return current standings/classification
164  return standings;
165  }
166 
171  public IEnumerator<Match> GetEnumerator() => matches.GetEnumerator();
172 
178  IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() => GetEnumerator();
179 
189  public bool NextMatch(out Match match)
190  {
191  if (!matchEnumerator.MoveNext())
192  {
193  match = null;
194  matchEnumerator.Dispose();
195  return false;
196  }
197  else
198  {
199  match = matchEnumerator.Current;
200  return true;
201  }
202  }
203 
212  public void SetResult(Winner result)
213  {
214  // Get current match
215  Match match = matchEnumerator.Current;
216 
217  // If table already contains a result for this match,
218  // throw exception
219  if (results.ContainsKey(match))
220  {
221  throw new InvalidOperationException(
222  $"Match '{match}' already has a result");
223  }
224 
225  // Add to results table
226  results.Add(match, result);
227 
228  // If these thinkers are not yet in the points table, add them
229  if (!thinkerPoints.ContainsKey(match.thinkerWhite.ThinkerName))
230  thinkerPoints.Add(match.thinkerWhite.ThinkerName, 0);
231  if (!thinkerPoints.ContainsKey(match.thinkerRed.ThinkerName))
232  thinkerPoints.Add(match.thinkerRed.ThinkerName, 0);
233 
234  // Update thinker points
235  switch (result)
236  {
237  // White won
238  case Winner.White:
239  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerWhite.ThinkerName]
240  += pointsPerWin;
241  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerRed.ThinkerName]
242  += pointsPerLoss;
243  break;
244  // Red won
245  case Winner.Red:
246  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerRed.ThinkerName]
247  += pointsPerWin;
248  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerWhite.ThinkerName]
249  += pointsPerLoss;
250  break;
251  // Game ended in a draw
252  case Winner.Draw:
253  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerWhite.ThinkerName]
254  += pointsPerDraw;
255  thinkerPoints[match.thinkerRed.ThinkerName]
256  += pointsPerDraw;
257  break;
258  // Invalid situation
259  default:
260  throw new InvalidOperationException(
261  "Invalid end of match result");
262  }
263  }
264  }
265 }
